about_the_game:
Game Overview

Star Watch is a casual game combining elements of "light-action shooting" and "creature care and management." Players take on the role of the Star Watch commander, leading a squad of unique monsters to fight against the evil alien invaders—the Cows, and reclaim the occupied planets and their precious relics!

Game Features

  • 20 Unique Monsters: Each monster has distinct abilities and appearances, allowing players to freely form their own custom squads.

  • 6 Major Planet Levels: Explore planets with unique environmental challenges, each featuring a powerful BOSS with special abilities.

  • Easy-to-Learn Controls: All actions are performed by simple clicks, making the game accessible to players of all ages.

  • Diverse Strategy Choices: Combine turret controls with carefully selected monster abilities to fend off enemies, adapting strategies to different planetary environments.

  • Planet Relic Collection: Defeat the final BOSS on each planet to reclaim valuable relics, enhancing your monster squad for future battles.

Gameplay

Players will need to raise monsters and manage resources to expand their influence across the galaxy. When enemies attack, players must skillfully operate turrets and unleash special monster abilities to fend off the invading Cows while protecting their squad. After each level, players can earn rewards to upgrade their monsters and technologies, further strengthening their forces for tougher challenges ahead.

short_description: Lead your squad in Star Watch, a fast-paced game combining action shooting and creature management. Fight the evil Cows, reclaim planets, and collect powerful relics! With 20 monsters to collect, six planets with boss battles, and simple click-to-play controls, strategic fun awaits!
